Line77.7FA05: Ah. You’re right. (chuckle) Let’s get the horses ready.
Line58.6D03F: And while we look for him, you’ll have time to work on the stone. That’s what you wanted, isn’t it?
Line56.7FA05: I thought we were after Lilith, not Elias?
Line60.7FA05: (sigh) Damn it. I’ll bite. On one of those rare occasions you gave me good advice, you said, “The answers you need are often in the place you least want to look.”
VoiceDir85.6D03F: First sentence directed at Neyrelle, second sentence directed at player
Line75.6DE47: Finding him may lead to her...
Line64.6D03F: Bloody hell. He finished the ritual from the volcano, then.
Line35.6DE47: Elias...that’s the man who summoned Lilith. You’re saying he summoned a lesser evil, too?
Line62.6D03F: It was you who said that.
Line15.789BF: Before going to the Steppes, Elias came to Hawezar. Took something that wasn’t his. It’s why I’m hunting him.
Line85.6D03F: Keep up, girl. Is Andariel gone?
Line46.789BF: I have a...friend in Hawezar who has mastered the art of immortality. She might know his secret. Let me take you to her.
